name: The Struggle of Sam Jones
description:
Description

The Struggle of Sam Jones is a top-down, story rich adventure game that aims to make a statement on the problems within society. The story follows Sam Jones, as he tries to acquire resources to help his sick wife in a time where food and medicine are in low supply and conditions of living are poor. Whilst Sam and his companions are barely surviving, the other half of society, who have walled themselves off from those that do not hinder to their beliefs and views of the world and culture, continue to live large and comfortably in the city. Sam must embark on a dangerous mission to acquire what he needs from the city without losing himself before he loses his wife.

The Team - Left Trigger Studios

Lachlan Kell: Lead Narrative Design/Scriptwriter, Level/Environmental Design, Audio Design, Programmer

Luigi Salvador: Environmental Artist, Character Artist, Animations

Tiryon Williams: Lead Programmer, Mechanics Implementation, Narrative Design
